pageContext.claim: “Nobody, nobody has been tougher on Russia or China than I have, nobody even close.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump has been remarkably weak on Russia. Trump sided with Russian President Vladimir Putin over the U.S. intelligence community on the question of interfering in the U.S. presidential election in 2016. Trump also resisted congressional efforts to sanction Russia and has led a charge to weaken NATO and the European Union -- two important goals of Putin. While Trump launched a trade war with China, he quickly accepted half a loaf in a "phase one" trade deal.
